translations.%s is your Nextcloud authentication code: %s ni msimbo wako wa uthibitishaji wa Nextcloud
translations.`%s` is your Nextcloud verification code: `%s` ni msimbo wako wa uthibitishaji wa Nextcloud.
translations.Two-factor gateway providers (Signal, SM: Watoa huduma wa lango la mambo mawili (Signal, SMS, Telegram, WhatsApp, XMPP)
translations.A set of Nextcloud two-factor providers: Seti ya watoa huduma wa vipengele viwili vya Nextcloud kutuma misimbo ya uthibitishaji kupitia Mawimbi, SMS, Telegramu, WhatsApp na XMPP.
translations.You are not using {displayName} for two-: Hutumii {displayName} kwa uthibitishaji wa vipengele viwili kwa sasa.
translations.Could not verify your code. Please try a: Haikuweza kuthibitisha nambari yako. Tafadhali jaribu tena.
translations.Enter your identification (e.g. phone nu: Weka kitambulisho chako (k.m. nambari ya simu ili kuanza uthibitishaji):
translations.A confirmation code has been sent to {ph: Nambari ya kuthibitisha imetumwa kwa {phone}. Tafadhali weka msimbo hapa:
translations.Your account was successfully configured: Akaunti yako ilisanidiwa kupokea ujumbe kupitia {displayName}.
translations.Error while sending the Message. Please: Hitilafu wakati wa kutuma Ujumbe. Tafadhali jaribu tena baadaye au wasiliana na msimamizi.
translations.Your phone number has changed and had no: Nambari yako ya simu imebadilika na haikuwa imethibitishwa tena. Tumia utaratibu wa vipengele viwili tofauti au uwasiliane na msimamizi wako.
